title: Two Teenagers from Northern Ireland:  Episode 100
content:encoded:
Portadown, near Belfast, February 2000. In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly podcast I explore how two innocent teenagers were caught up in the political conflict of the time, with terrible results.
